#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	long long int n,t;
	int x ,y,flag,tmp;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--){
		flag = 1;
		std::cin >> n;
		tmp = 0;x = 0,y = 1;
		while(tmp <= n){
			tmp = x+y;
			x = y;
			y = tmp;
			if(n == tmp){
				cout << "Yes\n";
				flag = 0;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(flag)
			cout << "No\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
